references.reason: This book is a foundational work in causal inference, providing the theoretical underpinnings for many of the concepts discussed in the paper.
This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of causal representation learning, a field closely related to the paper's focus on influence relations.

references.paper_title: Rehearsal learning for avoiding undesired future
references.reason: This paper introduces the rehearsal learning framework, which is directly extended and improved upon in the current work.
This highly influential review paper provides a broad overview of deep learning methods, which are utilized within the current research for predictive modeling.
This paper lays the groundwork for cost-sensitive learning, a crucial component of the proposed AUF-MICNS algorithm, which incorporates the cost of decision actions.
